thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India Budget: Fiscal Deficit For 2018/19 Seen At 3.3 Pct Of Gdp

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India Budget: Fiscal Deficit For 2018/19 Seen At 3.3 Pct Of Gdp
text:
MUMBAI, Feb 1 (Reuters) - Finance Minister Says:
:FISCAL DEFICIT FOR 2017/18 SEEN AT 3.5 PCT OF GDP : FISCAL DEFICIT FOR 2018/19 SEEN AT 3.3 PCT OF GDP : USE FISCAL DEFICIT TARGET AS KEY OPERATIONAL PARAMETER FOR FISCAL CONSOLIDATION
: PROPOSING TO ACCEPT THE KEY RECOMMENDATION OF THE FRBM PANEL (Reporting by New Delhi Newsroom)
